item.description:
Brighton/Allston has a significant mandarin-speaking population (and many other Asians), so I'm guessing that this list has a good percentage of listmembers near Brighton/Allston - riding in from Boston University on the C or B line (preferably B) or taking the #57 bus from Kenmore Square or the #66 bus from Harvard Square or through Brookline, or from the Longwood Medical Area (where HMS and HSPH and the Harvard teaching hospitals are).

All pizza and sandwiches here are health-supporting, no-cholesterol, and DAIRY-FREE.

So if you're lactose intolerant (or just don't like cheese or dairy products), Peace o' Pie Vegan Pizzeria - Allston-Brighton (near Grasshopper) is one of the two places in Boston to go... (the other is VeggiePlanet in Harvard Square, but there you need to ask for a replacement topping).

Schedule now, since this is a small place (and it's cold outside).

Eric Prescott (a former Los Angeles-based film producer and actor) runs this pizzeria and sandwich shop.

Near Twin Donuts, Walgreen's, the Boston fire station on the acute angle, Grasshopper (Vietnamese vegan restaurant), and the Jackson-Mann Community School
item.how_to_find_us: Ask anyone at Peace o' Pie who seems to be 'in the know' - ask for Maynard or Martha
